Replace.Text: [COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_BABYLON_MOD_DESCRIPTION]Contains a new civilization and leader, 6 new city-states, 25 new great people, and the Heroes and Legends game mode.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_BABYLON_MOD_TEASER]New Civilization and Leader - Hammurabi of Babylon
